Scripts.Text:
SPAWN 3 
    VARIABLE 0x4
    ROTATION 0 0 1
    POSITION RELATIVE 0 0 200
ENDSPAWN

SPAWN 3 
    VARIABLE 0x4
    ROTATION 0 0 2
    POSITION RELATIVE 200 0 -200
ENDSPAWN

SPAWN 3 
    VARIABLE 0x4
    ROTATION 0 0 3
    POSITION RELATIVE 200 0 300
ENDSPAWN

SPAWN 3 
    VARIABLE 0x4
    ROTATION 0 0 4
    POSITION RELATIVE 500 0 140
ENDSPAWN

SPAWN 3 
    VARIABLE 0x4
    ROTATION 0 0 5
    POSITION RELATIVE -200 0 -340
ENDSPAWN

SPAWN 3 
    VARIABLE 0x4
    ROTATION 0 0 6
    POSITION RELATIVE 100 0 -540
ENDSPAWN

SPAWN 3 
    VARIABLE 0x4
    ROTATION 0 0 7
    POSITION RELATIVE -300 0 40
ENDSPAWN

set SCRIPT_START AFTERSPAWN
AFTERSPAWN:


TALK Talk
    SET NO_AUTO_ANIM TRUE
    SET ANIMATION TALKING
    FACE SELF TOWARDS PLAYER
    SET TALK_MODE TRUE
    SET RESPONSE_ACTIONS ENDCONV ENABLEALL GO
    AWAIT RESPONSE



ENDCONV:
    SHOW_TEXTBOX OhOK
    AWAIT TALKING_END
    SET TALK_MODE FALSE
    RETURN

ENABLEALL:
    SHOW_TEXTBOX Enabled
    SET VAR.1 = 1
    SET VAR.2 = 1
    SET VAR.3 = 1
    SET VAR.4 = 1
    SET VAR.5 = 1
    SET VAR.6 = 1
    SET VAR.7 = 1
    AWAIT TALKING_END
    SET TALK_MODE FALSE
    RETURN  




GO:
    CCALL NpcM_StopNSwop

    SHOW_TEXTBOX Message1
    SET TALK_PERSIST TRUE
    AWAIT TALKING_END
    SHOW_TEXTBOX Message4
    SET TALK_PERSIST FALSE

    SET ANIMATION Magic1 once
    PLAY SFX NA_SE_VO_LI_AUTO_JUMP
    AWAIT TEXTBOX_NUM 2
    PLAY SFX NA_SE_VO_LI_LASH
    SET ANIMATION Magic2 once
    AWAIT TEXTBOX_NUM 3
    PLAY SFX NA_SE_VO_LI_SWORD_N
    SET ANIMATION Magic3 once

    SET TALK_PERSIST TRUE
    AWAIT TALKING_END


    SHOW_TEXTBOX MessageGO
    PLAY SFX NA_SE_VO_LI_FALL_L
    PLAY SFX NA_SE_IT_BOMB_EXPLOSION
    SET REF_ACTOR SELF

    PARTICLE EXPLOSION
        SCALE 400
        SCALE_UPDATE 21
        ACCELERATION 0 10 0
        VELOCITY 0 10 0
        POSITION ABSOLUTE ACTORF.0x24 ACTORF.0x28 ACTORF.0x2C
    ENDPARTICLE 

    SET INVISIBLE true
    SET CASTS_SHADOW FALSE
    AWAIT FOREVER
ENDTALK
Scripts.Name: Test

Messages.Name: Message1
Messages.MessageText:
<SOUND:NA_SE_SY_PIECE_OF_HEART>Alright, here we go!
The data is already in place!

Messages.Name: Message4
Messages.MessageText:
<Shift:90><NS>3!
<New box>
<Shift:90><DI><NS>2!
<New box>
<Shift:90><DI><NS>1!

Messages.Name: MessageGO
Messages.MessageText: <Shift:80><R><DI>GO!<PERSISTENT>

Messages.Name: Talk
Messages.MessageText:
Set everything up first by talking
to the items you need!
<New box>
<Three choices>Or... are you already done?<G>
Nope, hold on.
Just enable EVERYTHING!
I am ready,

Messages.Name: OhOK
Messages.MessageText: Oh, OK. Take your time.

Messages.Name: Enabled
Messages.MessageText:
OK, everything is now on!
Talk to me again to begin.

Scripts.Text:
IF DISTANCE_FROM_PLAYER < 20 AND VAR.1 != 1

    VAR.1 = 1
    SET TALK_PERSIST TRUE

    IF EXT_VAR 0 1 = 1
        SET RESPONSE_ACTIONS DISABLE ENABLE
        FORCE_TALK Enabled
        AWAIT RESPONSE
    ELSE
        SET RESPONSE_ACTIONS ENABLE DISABLE
        FORCE_TALK Disabled
        AWAIT RESPONSE
    ENDIF
ELIF DISTANCE_FROM_PLAYER > 20
    VAR.1 = 0
ENDIF

RETURN


DISABLE:
    SET EXT_VAR 0 1 = 0
    SHOW_TEXTBOX Done!
    SET TALK_PERSIST FALSE
    AWAIT TALKING_END
    RETURN

ENABLE:
    SET EXT_VAR 0 1 = 1
    SHOW_TEXTBOX Done!
    SET TALK_PERSIST FALSE
    AWAIT TALKING_END
    RETURN
